build.lib.CausalLearning.model_validation_protocols.kfold package

Submodules

build.lib.CausalLearning.model_validation_protocols.kfold.kfold module

class KFoldCV[source]

Bases: MVP_ProtocolBase

Class implementing a K-Fold Cross-Validation protocol for running a causal discovery algorithm.

folds: int

Number of folds to be used in the cross-validation. Default is 10.

folds_to_run: int

Number of folds to run the cross-validation for. Default is 1.

train_indexes: list of int

A list of indexes for the training samples.

test_indexes: list of int

A list of indexes for the test samples.

data_train: list of pd.DataFrame

A list of training data samples.

data_test: list of pd.DataFrame

A list of test data samples.

set_params(self, parameters)

Set the number of folds and the number of folds to run the protocol for.

run_cd_algorithm(self, data, algorithm, parameters, fold)

Run the causal discovery algorithm on the specified fold.

init_protocol(self, data)

Initialize the K-Fold protocol.

run_protocol(self, data, algorithm, parameters, n_jobs = 1)

Run the K-Fold cross-validation protocol.

set_params(parameters)[source]

Set the number of folds and the number of folds to run the protocol for.

parameters: dict

A dictionary of parameters, including the number of folds and the number of folds to run the protocol for.

run_cd_algorithm(data, algorithm, parameters, fold)[source]

Run the causal discovery algorithm on the specified fold.

data: pd.DataFrame

The data to be used for running the algorithm.

algorithm: object

The causal discovery algorithm to be used.

parameters: dict

A dictionary of parameters to be passed to the algorithm.

fold: int

The current fold to run the algorithm for.

[matrix_mec_graph, matrix_graph]: list of numpy arrays

The results of the causal discovery algorithm, including the matrix_mec_graph and matrix_graph.

init_protocol(data)[source]

Initialize the K-Fold protocol.

data: pd.DataFrame

The data to be used for the cross-validation.

run_protocol(data, algorithm, parameters, n_jobs=1)[source]

Run the causal discovery algorithm on the specified fold.

data: pd.DataFrame

The data to be used for running the algorithm.

algorithm: object

The causal discovery algorithm to be used.

parameters: dict

A dictionary of parameters to be passed to the algorithm.

n_jobs: int

The number of CPU cores to run in parallel

[matrix_mec_graphs, matrix_graphs]: list of numpy arrays

The results of the protocol, including the matrix_mec_graph and matrix_graph.
